Description: OMEGA K.M. KRIEGSMARINE U-BOOT - very rare antique Swiss men's watch service wristwatches of the German Army 1914-1918 WWI. This watch was altered from pocket in wrist watch. This watch has Amazing ART DECO silver 0.925 case. The re-finished dial is in excellent condition, is original but only professionally restored and beautifully done. Mechanism has been recently serviced by one of the best watchmakers in my city and it has fully working condition. Dome glass is plastic (Plexiglas). This watch comes to our time in good status and was very well saved. This watch is an interesting acquisition for collectors, stylish present for friend, also - for everyday use.To the watch a watchband is added in a gift.Any defects not mentioned but visible in the pictures will be considered as described!Approximate sizes:Diameter of watch with crown: 77mmDiameter of watch: 58mmDiameter of dial: 47mmThickness of watch: 19mmWatchband size: 22mm We ready to send our products Worldwide.
